title: Student Citizenship Development Project through Participation and Experiential Learning in [Large-Scale] Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social engagement concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Students engage in asynchronous collaborative activities using personal devices, exploring civic consciousness through community problem-solving projects.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real community issues and propose at least three citizen engagement strategies
Learners achieve over 80% participation rates in peer discussions using online collaboration tools
Learners can establish a civic consciousness action plan and present at least one implementation result after a two-week experiential learning period

resources: LMS platforms (with video conferencing, discussion boards, assignment submission)
Digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Google Jamboard)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
